summary: Adds the ability to learn the spell "Unforgiving Force". A powerful spell created by anceint mages to mimic the power of the thuum, and even over power it. Think of Force Pushing.
descriptionHtml:
What's New?!
--------------------
1.3: HUGE Update
-Added new spell "Unforgiving Force (weak)"
-Located right new to original spell tome in Skyforge
-Force is now set to 40 instead of 999,999
-Shock damage is now set to 35 over 1sec instead of 55 over 3sec
-A mana cost of 45
-Charge time of 0.5
-Change to disarm weak opponents

About
---------------------
According to certain tomes ancient mages that lived along side of those who could produce a thuum grew jealous of their abilities. After much time a group of mages had perfected a duplicate effect and even surpassed it in power. After seeing the raw power of this spell the mages sealed it away fearing it's power were it to fall into the wrong hands. But somehow it has found it's way into yours.

About the spell
---------------------
Unforgiving Force is a spell in the Destruction class that combines the force from Unrelenting Force and Lighting.
99999 Force Power
55 Shock Damage over 2 seconds

After casting the spell a giant wave of energy is projected from your hand and any target that is hit is instantly sent hurling through the air at mind bending speeds all while dealing 55 shock damage. Dual casting Unforgiving Force increases the wave size 5x.

Installation
---------------------
Place the file in the "Data" folder in your Skyrim directory and make sure you activate it!

Locatation
---------------------
You can find the spell book at Skyforge to the right of the fire pit next to a helmet.

Change Log
---------------------
v1.0 - Initial release.
v1.1 - Added "About the spell" Displaying stats and a much better description. And added 4 more photos
v1.3
-Added new spell "Unforgiving Force (weak)"
Changed Values
-Force from 999,999 to 45
-Shock Damage from 55 over 3sec to 35 over 1sec
-Mana cost from 0 to 45
-Charge time from 0.0 to 0.5
author: Pancho Joshi
